description: An instance of the global playlist configuration.
title: AudioPlaylistsConfig

___lists.description: The list of playlists. Each member is an instance of a playlist.
___lists.title: Lists

___autoPlay.description: This sets whether or not the playlist starts automatically.
___autoPlay.title: AutoPlay

___loop.description: This sets whether or not the playlist repeats after the play of the last track.
___loop.title: Loop

___default.description: The default track UID of the playlist.
___default.title: Default Track

___tracks.description: The list of tracks UID associated to the playlist.
___tracks.title: Tracks

___tracks.description: The list of tracks. Each member is an instance of a track.
___tracks.title: Tracks

___url.description: The file URL of the track.
___url.title: URL

___loop.description: This sets whether or not the track repeats after a script tells it to play.
___loop.title: Loop
